thread.title: Watch this 57-year-old's emotional reaction reaction to first flight
thread.title_full: Watch this 57-year-old's emotional reaction reaction to first flight

title: Watch this 57-year-old's emotional reaction reaction to first flight
text:
Watch this 57-year-old's emotional reaction reaction to first flight Last updated 12:27, July 25 2015 
For many taking off in an airplane can be a bit scary and it's easy to forget how amazing it really is. 
Just watch Patsy Carville, from Newry, Northern Ireland and his emotional and rather hilarious reaction to his first take-off. 
"My daddy's first time on a plane and I managed to catch a video of the take off," his daughter Michelle Carville wrote beneath the video, which she posted on Facebook . MICHELLE CARVILLE/FACEBOOK 
"It was too funny not to share." 
The 57-year-old was flying from Dublin to Liverpool to see his daughter graduate from university.
